title: Sunken City
description:
The Sunken City can be found in the Oceans over The Overworld.

There you will find some creatures that may drop on death important ingredients for the creation of the Abyssal Sacrifice.

This item will must be placed in the Altar of Abyss to summon an ancient creature known as The Leaviathan. Finally you need to defeat it to obtain the Abyss Eye.
